org.symphonyoss.client.impl

Class CustomHttpClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.symphonyoss.client.impl.CustomHttpClient

  • public class CustomHttpClient
extends java.lang.Object
    A custom HTTP client can be used when there are specific connectivity requirements or there is a need to support multiple keystores.

        Create custom client with specific keystores.

        clientKeyStore - Client (BOT) keystore file
